verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אוֹדְךָ֥ <S%H3034><s%> 'od-Cha I will praise בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- all לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi; thee with my whole heart נֶ֖גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him before the gods אֲזַמְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-me-Re-ka. will I sing praise

אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֨ה <S%H7812><s%> 'esh-ta-cha-Veh I will worship אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הֵיכַ֪ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal temple קָדְשְׁךָ֡ <S%H6944><s%> kod-she-cha toward thy holy וְא֘וֹדֶ֤ה <S%H3034><s%> ve-'o-Deh and praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמֶ֗ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha, thy name עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- according חַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-Cha for thy lovingkindness וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- according אֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H571><s%> 'a-mit-Te-cha; and for thy truth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִגְדַּ֥לְתָּ <S%H1431><s%> hig-Dal-ta for thou hast magnified עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- according כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> ka-lo-Shi- to all שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> me-Cha, above all thy name אִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H565><s%> 'im-ra-Te-cha. thy word

בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom In the day קָ֭רָֽאתִי <S%H7121><s%> Ka-ra-ti when I cried וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> vat-ta-'a-Ne-ni; thou answeredst תַּרְהִבֵ֖נִי <S%H7292><s%> tar-hi-Ve-ni me [and] strengthenedst בְנַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> ve-naf-Shi in my soul עֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> 'Oz. me [with] strength

יוֹד֣וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du-cha shall praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh thee O LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> mal-chei- All the kings אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; of the earth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki When שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> me-'U, when they hear אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> 'im-rei- the words פִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> Fi-cha. of thy mouth

וְ֭יָשִׁירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Ve-ya-shi-ru Yea they shall sing בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> be-dar-Chei in the ways יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki For גָ֝ד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, for great כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod [is] the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- though רָ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> ram [be] high יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Though the LORD וְשָׁפָ֣ל <S%H8217><s%> ve-sha-Fal unto the lowly יִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh; yet hath he respect וְ֝גָבֹ֗הַּ <S%H1364><s%> ve-ga-Vo-ah, but the proud מִמֶּרְחָ֥ק <S%H4801><s%> mi-mer-Chak afar off יְיֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> ye-ye-Da'. he knoweth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Though אֵלֵ֤ךְ׀ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech walk בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev in the midst צָרָ֗ה <S%H6869><s%> tza-Rah, of trouble תְּחַ֫יֵּ֥נִי <S%H2421><s%> te-Chai-Ye-ni thou wilt revive עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al against אַ֣ף <S%H639><s%> 'af against the wrath אֹ֭יְבַי <S%H341><s%> 'O-ye-vai of mine enemies תִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> tish-Lach me thou shalt stretch forth יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha; thine hand וְת֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <S%H3467><s%> ve-Too-shi-'E-ni shall save יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha. and thy right hand

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִגְמֹ֪ר <S%H1584><s%> yig-Mor will perfect בַּ֫עֲדִ֥י <S%H1157><s%> ba-'a-Di what יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD חַסְדְּךָ֣ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-Cha [that which] concerneth me thy mercy לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; [endureth] for ever מַעֲשֵׂ֖י <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei not the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-cha of thine own hands אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֶּֽרֶף׃ <S%H7503><s%> Te-ref. forsake
